text: N’igihe bagerwagaho n’igitabo (Qur’an) giturutse kwa Allah, gishimangira ibyo bafite (ihishurwa ry’ubutumwa bw’Intumwa Muhamadi muri Tawurati, barabihakanye), kandi mbere (yo kuza kw’Intumwa Muhamadi) barabyifashishaga nk’ingabo basaba Allah gutsinda abahakanyi. Ariko bamaze kugerwaho n’ibyo bari baramenye (ubutumwa bwa Muhamadi) barabihakanye. Ku bw’ibyo, umuvumo wa Allah ube ku bahakanyi
